title: Add MCP resources for project context
description: Implement MCP resources to expose project config, module definitions, and agent status. Use URIs like config://project, status://agents, modules://list.

title: Document MCP client configuration
description: Document how to connect to nstrumenta MCP server from Claude Desktop, Cline, and other MCP clients. Include example config files. Add to src/nodejs/README.md or docs/.

title: Create development MCP server launcher
description: Add npm script dev:mcp using node --watch for hot-reload. Use tsc --watch in parallel. Update package.json with development workflow scripts.

title: Create MCP test infrastructure
description: Set up Jest/TypeScript test framework for MCP server in src/nodejs/__tests__/mcp.test.ts. Include proper jest.config.js and add test scripts to package.json. Use modern Node.js --watch flag instead of nodemon.

title: Add MCP tools for core operations
description: Extend src/nodejs/mcp.ts with tools for: list_data, get_data, upload_data, list_agents, agent_start, module_publish, module_run, project_info. Each tool wraps existing CLI command functions.
